bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding collective bargaining for teachers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding collective bargaining for teachers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-39 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: Notwithstanding any provision in chapters 13-39 or 60-9A, there shall be a separate collective bargaining unit and negotiations for kindergarten through grade twelve teachers and for postsecondary technical institute instructors within the same LEA. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
